snippet: Mary Bono, the widow of Representative Sonny Bono, said today that she would run for his seat in a special election on April 7.    Mrs. Bono, 36, said she had been urged to run by Speaker Newt Gingrich, former Vice President Dan Quayle and other R...
lead_paragraph: Mary Bono, the widow of Representative Sonny Bono, said today that she would run for his seat in a special election on April 7. Mrs. Bono, 36, said she had been urged to run by Speaker Newt Gingrich, former Vice President Dan Quayle and other Republican leaders. Her announcement did not address whether she planned to run for a full term in November.
abstract: Mary Bono, widow of Rep Sonny Bono, says she will run for his House seat in special election on April 7 (S)

headline.main: Bono's Widow to Run for His Seat in House
